Secretary of State for the Home Department
In the course of his meteoric career as Secretary of State for the Home Department, the Right Honorable Topham Vinson instituted many reforms and earned the reformer's whack of praise and blame.
Hornung, E. W. (Ernest William), 1866-1921; Steele, Frederic Dorr, 1873-1944 [Illustrator]
